title: 3 and Out - Rams Roll, Kliff's Collapse Complete, Bills/Chiefs AFC Heavyweights, Mac and Dak's Limitations, What Russ Wants, Mailbag
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Rams Roll, Kliff's Collapse Complete, Bills/Chiefs AFC Heavyweights, Mac and Dak's Limitations, What Russ Wants, Mailbag
description:
John reacts to the Rams blowout of the Cardinals on Monday night, and why Kliff Kingsbury should be done in Arizona. Then he looks at the massive upcoming Bills/Chiefs AFC heavyweight fight, why the Cowboys need to adapt their offense to mask Dak Prescott's weaknesses, why the Patriots need to load up on playmakers to win in the playoffs again, and why the Seahawks shouldn't let Russell Wilson to dictate personnel decisions. He also answers listener questions in the Middlekauff Mailbag.

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
